  • Cortex-wide microscopy at cellular resolution

Cortex-wide microscopy at cellular resolution
Vision: This project aims at developping large field-of-view and high resolution optical microscopy for dynamic cotex-wide neural imaging in the mouse brain.
Camera-array based microscopy Multi-planar microsocpy
Arbitrary Surface Microscopy Multi-channel Neural Imaging
Contact us: xiehao@tsinghua.edu.cn
